name: From The Night
description:
In this retro platformer, the goal is simple. Get to the exit door. Of course, it's never just that simple…

You begin the game trapped in prison.



First you must break out, which is a task in itself – but breaking out of prison is never easy, unless you're Stallone! But it's simple once you know how…



After that, you'll make your way into a complex network of levels which you must traverse.



The path from door to door becomes increasingly difficult.



Ingenious traps – each one designed to kill you – litter your pathway. Some you can simply jump over. Others you can crouch underneath. However, there are those where you'll need luck, skill and speed.



And two questions remain. Are you really free? Indeed, who's the one who's really trapped…?



Maybe you'll choose to stay a prisoner and escape faster and faster each time. Perhaps even death might be out of the quesiton…
